DialogueOption.Text: Hey, Galena. Got any questions about the universe for me?
I figured out why jellyfish on Giant's Deep rise to the surface sometimes!
Hey, Galena. Got any questions about the universe for me?
Hey, Galena. Got any questions about the universe for me?

Dialogue.Page: <size=20>Is it true that there are big scary monsters on Giant's Deep's surface?</size>

DialogueOption.Text: Uh... There's jellyfish on Giant's Deep, but they live deep underwater!

Dialogue.Page: <size=20>Feldspar told me that the monsters on Giant's Deep don't hide underwater all the time...</size>
<size=20>Feldspar said that sometimes.. <Pause=1> They come to the surface too!</size>
<size=20>It's so scary.. I thought the surface of Giant's Deep would be safe from monsters, so I could go there someday to watch the pretty waves... But if they come up to the surface too...</size>
<size=20>Um.. Just be careful if you ever visit Giant's Deep, okay, astronaut?</size>
<size=20>Remember that even on the surface, you aren't safe from the monsters!</size>
<size=20>Feldspar's been to Giant's Deep before... They told me about the monsters that live in its oceans...</size>
<size=20>It wouldn't be so bad if the monsters stayed deep underwater... <Pause=1> But Feldspar said that sometimes they come to the surface too.</size>
<size=20>It's so scary.. I thought the surface of Giant's Deep would be safe from monsters, so I could go there someday to watch the pretty waves...</size>
<size=20>Um.. Just be careful if you ever visit Giant's Deep, okay, astronaut?</size>
<size=20>Remember that even on the surface, you aren't safe from the monsters!</size>

DialogueOption.Text: Hey, Galena. Have you.. heard anything about stuff that disappears sometimes?
Where do I look for your toy rocket again, Galena?
I saw your toy rocket in the drain, Galena.
Hey, Galena. Have you.. heard anything about stuff that disappears sometimes?
Where do I look for your toy rocket again, Galena?
I saw your toy rocket in the drain, Galena.
Hey, Galena. Have you.. heard anything about stuff that disappears sometimes?
Where do I look for your toy rocket again, Galena?
I saw your toy rocket in the drain, Galena.
